metadata.title: Matchlyst — AI-Powered Freelancer Screening
metadata.description: Matchlyst helps clients hire freelancers using AI-generated, job-specific interviews. No generic vetting. No spam applications.
metadata.keywords: AI freelancer platform, freelancer screening, hire developers, freelancer vetting, AI hiring, Toptal alternative
metadata.ogTitle: Matchlyst — Hire Freelancers Screened for Your Exact Job
metadata.ogDescription: An AI-powered freelance hiring platform that generates custom interviews for every job and ranks candidates by real skill.
metadata.twitterDescription: Stop wasting time screening freelancers. Matchlyst uses AI-generated interviews tailored to every job.

hero.subheadline: The first hiring platform that predicts which freelancer will actually deliver — not just who interviews well.

howItWorks.label: How it works
howItWorks.title: Three steps to
howItWorks.subtitle: A streamlined process that replaces weeks of screening with intelligent, automated evaluation.
howItWorks.step1Description: Describe the role you need filled. Our system captures the nuances that matter.
howItWorks.step2Description: Every job gets unique interview questions — designed to test the exact skills you need.
howItWorks.step3Description: Receive a ranked list of candidates scored on real capability. No noise, no spam.

whyDifferent.label: Why this is different
whyDifferent.title: Not another
whyDifferent.subtitle: Two perspectives, one intelligent platform. See how Matchlyst works from both sides — intelligent screening connects the right clients with the right freelancers.
whyDifferent.mockQuestion: How would you optimize a dashboard with 50+ real-time data streams?

whoItsFor.label: Who it's for
whoItsFor.title: Built for
whoItsFor.subtitle: Whether you're hiring or freelancing, Matchlyst levels the playing field with smarter screening.
whoItsFor.clientDescription: Stop wasting time screening. Let the platform do it — job by job. Get a curated list of freelancers who actually match your requirements.
whoItsFor.freelancerDescription: Be evaluated on real skill, not bidding wars. Showcase your true capability through intelligent, relevant assessments.

waitlist.label: Get early access
waitlist.title: Join the
waitlist.subtitle: Be the first to experience a new way to hire. Limited spots available for early adopters.
waitlist.successMessage: We'll be in touch soon with early access details.
waitlist.disclaimer: No spam, ever. Unsubscribe at any time.

simulation.label: See it in action
simulation.title: Experience the
simulation.subtitle: Click below to simulate how Matchlyst generates tailored interview questions, evaluates candidates, and delivers ranked results - all in seconds.
simulation.idlePrompt: See how a job posting becomes a complete candidate evaluation.
simulation.q1: How would you optimize a React dashboard rendering 50+ real-time data streams?
simulation.q2: Describe your approach to managing complex state across micro-frontends.
simulation.q3: Walk us through designing a type-safe API layer with TypeScript and tRPC.
simulation.q4: How do you handle database migrations in a zero-downtime deployment pipeline?
simulation.q5: Explain your strategy for testing React components that rely on external APIs.
simulation.a1Short: I'd implement virtualized rendering with React Window, use Web Workers for data transformation, and batch state updates via useDeferredValue to keep the main thread responsive.
simulation.a2Short: I use a combination of module federation for code splitting and a shared event bus with Zustand stores, keeping each micro-frontend autonomous while maintaining a single source of truth for cross-cutting state.
simulation.a3Short: I build end-to-end type safety by defining shared schemas in Zod, generating tRPC routers from those schemas, and using inference helpers so the frontend gets autocomplete and validation for free.
simulation.analyzingSubtitle: Evaluating technical depth, problem solving, and communication…

jsonLd.organizationDescription: Matchlyst helps clients hire freelancers using AI-generated, job-specific interviews. No generic vetting. No spam applications.

waitlistStatus.shareText: I just joined the Matchlyst waitlist — a platform that screens freelancers with job-specific interviews. Check it out:

privacy.metaDescription: Learn how Matchlyst collects, uses, and protects your information.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Matchlyst ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website.
privacy.collectItem1: Email addresses submitted through our waitlist form
privacy.collectItem2: Information you voluntarily provide (such as role interest)
privacy.collectItem3: Anonymous usage data (such as page visits) for analytics purposes
privacy.collectNote: We do not collect sensitive personal information.
privacy.useItem1: Notify you about early access, updates, or product launches
privacy.useNote: We do not sell your personal information.
privacy.storageText: Waitlist information is stored securely using third-party infrastructure providers. Access is limited to authorized personnel only.
privacy.analyticsText: We may use privacy-focused analytics tools to understand how visitors interact with our website. These tools do not collect personally identifiable information.
privacy.cookiesText: We do not use cookies for advertising or tracking across websites.
privacy.thirdPartyText: We may use third-party services (such as hosting or analytics providers) that process limited data on our behalf.
privacy.choicesText: You may request removal of your email from our waitlist at any time by contacting us.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at:
